name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Proficient Senior Web Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing and implementing sophisticated applications utilizing **C#**, **Java**, **Python**, and **Angular**. Solid foundation in both frontend and backend frameworks, including **DHTMLX** and agile methodologies. Skilled in testing frameworks such as **Selenium** and **Mocha** to ensure high-quality deliverables. Experienced in version control systems like **Gitlab** and CI/CD practices to streamline development workflows. Proven ability to leverage cloud services like **AWS** and drive DevOps initiatives. Additionally, adept at collaborating effectively across teams and leading projects to successful completion while optimizing performance and enhancing user experience.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **C#** and **Java** frameworks to develop high-quality web applications, enhancing performance metrics by 30%.
Designed and executed **CI/CD** pipelines on **GitLab**, achieving a 40% reduction in deployment time while maintaining rigorous quality standards.
Implemented agile methodologies throughout the development process, resulting in a **25%** improvement in project delivery efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **Python** scripts for automation testing, improving code reliability and reducing bug rates by **15%**.
Developed user interfaces using **Angular** and **DHTMLX** frameworks to improve user engagement, leading to increased customer satisfaction scores by **25%**.
Conducted performance testing with **Selenium** and **Mocha**, ensuring applications meet desired specifications.
Maintained and optimized applications on **AWS**, improving scalability and reducing operational costs by **20%**.
Applied CSS techniques to enhance front-end visual appeal, driving a better user experience.
Maintained a strong focus on version control and collaboration using **GitLab**, fostering a team-oriented development culture.

Utilized **C#** and **Angular** to design and develop a cloud-based project management tool, achieving a **15%** increase in team collaboration efficiency.
Implemented **DevOps** practices by leading the effort to create CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, which reduced production deployment errors by **30%**.
Developed RESTful APIs with **.NET Core** and integrated them with a **PostgreSQL** database, facilitating real-time data access.
Created a microservices architecture utilizing **RabbitMQ** for task orchestration, and **Apache Kafka** for event-driven data streams, enhancing system scalability.
Optimized system performance by integrating **Redis** as a caching layer, resulting in a **25%** boost in response to frequent API calls.
Built and maintained frontend components using **ReactJS** and **Tailwind CSS**, leading to a **25%** improvement in user engagement on the platform.
Managed and optimized queries for **MSSQL** and **MySQL** databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders in an **Agile** environment to define system requirements and ensure timely project delivery.
Facilitated code reviews and conducted mentorship sessions with junior developers, which significantly improved team productivity.
Designed custom charts and graphs with **D3.js** to enhance project status tracking and reporting.

• Developed and maintained web applications using **C#** and **Angular**, enhancing team productivity by **20%**.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitLab** for streamlined deployment, reducing time to production by **30%**.
• Ensured high-quality software delivery through **Agile** methodologies, participating in daily standups and code reviews.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate applications with third-party APIs, facilitating seamless data exchange.
• Enhanced frontend experiences by utilizing **DHTMLX** and responsive **CSS** designs, leading to improved user satisfaction ratings.
• Conducted automated testing using **Selenium** and **Mocha**, increasing testing coverage by **40%**.
• Maintained and optimized existing applications to support scalability and performance, enabling a **15%** reduction in load times.
• Fostered a DevOps culture by collaborating with team members to automate processes on **AWS**, improving deployment frequency.
• Delivered comprehensive technical documentation and user guides, enhancing knowledge transfer and system understandability across teams.
• Assisted in the migration of legacy systems, ensuring a smooth transition while maintaining core functionalities.
